name: ModMail
description: An easy to install ModMail bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

GUILD_ID.description: The id for the server you are hosting this bot for.

STATUS.description: Set a custom playing status for the bot.

MENTION.description: A custom role/user to mention when creating a modmail thread. Default is @here

OWNERS.description: Comma seperated user IDs of people that are allowed to use owner only commands. (eval and update)
